title: Welcome to My Tech Notes
content: This is a placeholder for future technical notes, papers, and project documentation. What is this?This section is dedicated to: Research papers Iâ€™m reading. Course notes from NJU and HKUST. Technical tutorials and dev logs.

title: Hello World
content: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new My New Post More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

title: About Me
content: English | ä¸­æ–‡ .lang-btn { border: none; background: none; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1rem; padding: 4px 8px; border-radius: 4px; transition: all 0.2s ease; color: var(--text-p3); } .lang-btn.active { color: var(--text-p1); font-weight: bold; background: var(--card-hover); } .lang-btn:hover { color: var(--text-p1); } /* Hide duplicate TOC entries initially */ ZHU YEHANG ðŸ“§ 231880098@smail.nju.edu.cn EDUCATIONNanjing University â€” Sep 2023 â€“ PresentB.Eng. in Intelligent Software Engineering GPA: 4.515.0 (Major GPA 4.475.0) Rank: 11153 (Top 7.2%) The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology â€” Sep 2025 â€“ Dec 2025UG Exchange Program (Computer Science)Selected Coursework: Deep Learning in Computer Vision (COMP4471, Prof. Qifeng Chen) â€” Grade: A Cryptography (COMP3631, Prof. Cunsheng Ding) â€” Grade: A- Electronic Information Technology (ELEC1010, Prof. Xiaomeng Li) â€” Grade: A Yangzhou High School of Jiangsu Province â€” Sep 2020 â€“ Jun 2023 National College Entrance Examination (2023, Jiangsu): 669750(Chinese 125, Math 128, English 139, Physics 93, Chemistry 96, Biology 88) CERTIFICATIONS ACHIEVEMENTS CET-4: 684, CET-6: 603 IELTS: 8.0 (Listening 8.5, Speaking 7.5, Reading 8.5, Writing 6.5) â€” Oct 2023 Outstanding Freshman Award, Nanjing University (2023) Peopleâ€™s Scholarship (CNY 2000, Nov 2024) Yan Baoling Overseas Exchange Scholarship (Excellent Award) (fall 2025) National Scholarship (Fall 2025) WORK EXPERIENCESummer Intern | Shanghai Fanyun Information Technology Co., Ltd. Contributed to the early-stage development of the companyâ€™s intelligent QA system. Responsibilities included writing system design documentation, implementing backend logic and API testing based on the Dify platform, and creating front-end prototypes. RESEARCH EXPERIENCESemTabla: A Human-in-the-Loop Framework for Semantic Enrichment and Validation of Data Tables (Submitted to ACM CHI 2026) â€” May 2025 â€“ Sep 2025 Developed an interactive system integrating hierarchical extraction and critical sampling to address missing business semantics in data tables. Verified that extracted semantics significantly enhance LLMsâ€™ reasoning capabilities through user studies and quantitative experiments. Contribution: 3rd Author. Collaborated on system design, literature review, and user study analysis. Vue.js, React å·¥å…·ä¸Žå¹³å°: Git, Linux, Docker, LaTeX // Define TOC mapping const tocIdsEn = [ 'EDUCATION', 'CERTIFICATIONS-ACHIEVEMENTS', 'WORK-EXPERIENCE', 'RESEARCH-EXPERIENCE', 'PROJECTS', 'TECHNICAL-SKILLS' ]; const tocIdsZh = [ 'æ•™è‚²èƒŒæ™¯', 'è£èª‰ä¸Žè¯ä¹¦', 'å·¥ä½œä¸Žå®žè·µç»åŽ†', 'ç§‘ç ”ç»åŽ†', 'é¡¹ç›®ç»åŽ†', 'æŠ€æœ¯æŠ€èƒ½' ]; function updateTOC(lang) { // Try to find TOC links. Hexo stellar usually uses .toc-link // We try to match the href attribute const allLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.toc-link'); if (!allLinks.length) return; allLinks.forEach(link => { const href = link.getAttribute('href'); if (!href) return; // Remove # const id = decodeURIComponent(href.substring(1)); // Check if this ID belongs to EN or ZH list // Note: Hexo might add numbers or suffixes, so we check inclusion // A simpler way: Hide based on context if possible, but structure prevents it. // We check if the ID matches our known headers. let isEn = tocIdsEn.some(key => id.includes(key)); let isZh = tocIdsZh.some(key => id.includes(key)); if (lang === 'en') { if (isZh) { link.closest('.toc-item') ? link.closest('.toc-item').style.display = 'none' : link.style.display = 'none'; } else if (isEn) { link.closest('.toc-item') ? link.closest('.toc-item').style.display = 'block' : link.style.display = 'block'; } } else { if (isEn) { link.closest('.toc-item') ? link.closest('.toc-item').style.display = 'none' : link.style.display = 'none'; } else if (isZh) { link.closest('.toc-item') ? link.closest('.toc-item').style.display = 'block' : link.style.display = 'block'; } } }); } function showLang(lang) { const en = document.getElementById('resume-en'); const zh = document.getElementById('resume-zh'); const btnEn = document.getElementById('btn-en'); const btnZh = document.getElementById('btn-zh'); if (lang === 'en') { en.style.display = 'block'; zh.style.display = 'none'; btnEn.classList.add('active'); btnZh.classList.remove('active'); } else { en.style.display = 'none'; zh.style.display = 'block'; btnEn.classList.remove('active'); btnZh.classList.add('active'); } // Update TOC after a short delay to ensure DOM is ready if it's dynamic setTimeout(() => updateTOC(lang), 50); } // Initialize on load document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { showLang('en'); });
